meta.title: Mr. Whisk Leads Gala Moustache Jailbreak

beats.visual: Mr. Whisk draws gala moustache on mirror practicing voice.
Cardboard guards snooze; moustache stickers peel off bars.
Mr. Whisk hands disguises to fellow inmate plushies.
Security camera confused; moustaches clog the feed.
Mr. Whisk unveils secret exit shaped like giant comb.
Escape slide made of yarn drops squad into laundry basket getaway car.
Mr. Whisk drives basket; moustache flutters heroically.
Confetti pops as they crash through paper wall marked FREEDOM.
Mr. Whisk tips hat, moustache falls, everyone gasps playfully.

tts_line: Mr. Whisk insists disguises are ninety percent whiskers.
style_prompt: cartoon orange tabby cat, squash-and-stretch, clean bold outlines, flat colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, cardboard jail set with dramatic fake moustaches and props, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
